verses.verse: When thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> to <S%H3898>eat<s%> with a <S%H4910>ruler<s%>, <S%H995>Consider<s%> <S%H995>diligently<s%> him that is before <S%H6440>thee<s%>;
And <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7915>knife<s%> to thy <S%H3930>throat<s%>, If thou be a man <S%H1167>given<s%> to <S%H5315>appetite<s%>.
Be not <S%H183>desirous<s%> of his <S%H4303>dainties<s%>; Seeing they are <S%H3577>deceitful<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%>.
Weary <S%H3021><s%> not thyself to be <S%H6238>rich<s%>; <S%H2308>Cease<s%> from thine own <S%H998>wisdom<s%>.

Wilt thou <S%H5774>set<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon that which is <S%H6213>not<s%>? For riches certainly <S%H6213>make<s%> themselves <S%H3671>wings<s%>, Like an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that <S%H5774>flieth<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Eat <S%H3898><s%> thou not the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of him that hath an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%>, Neither <S%H183>desire<s%> thou his <S%H4303>dainties<s%>:
For as he <S%H8176>thinketh<s%> <S%H5315>within<s%> <S%H398>himself<s%>, so is he: Eat and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> he to <S%H3820>thee<s%>; But his heart is not with thee.
The <S%H6595>morsel<s%> which thou hast <S%H398>eaten<s%> shalt thou vomit <S%H6958>up<s%>, And <S%H7843>lose<s%> thy <S%H5273>sweet<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>.
Speak <S%H1696><s%> not in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%>; For he will <S%H936>despise<s%> the <S%H7922>wisdom<s%> of thy <S%H4405>words<s%>.
Remove <S%H5253><s%> not the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1366>landmark<s%>; And <S%H935>enter<s%> not into the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>:
For their <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is <S%H2389>strong<s%>; He will <S%H7378>plead<s%> their cause against <S%H7379>thee<s%>.
Apply <S%H935><s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, And thine <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
Withhold <S%H4513><s%> not <S%H4148>correction<s%> from the <S%H5288>child<s%>; For if thou <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, he will not <S%H4191>die<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, And shalt <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, if thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H2449>wise<s%>, My <S%H3820>heart<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad<s%>, even <S%H589>mine<s%>:
Yea <S%H3629><s%>, my heart will <S%H5937>rejoice<s%>, When thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> right <S%H4339>things<s%>.
Let not thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7065>envy<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%>; But be thou in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>:
For surely there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H319>reward<s%>; And thy <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H1121>thou<s%>, my son, and be <S%H2449>wise<s%>, And <S%H833>guide<s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
Be not among <S%H3196>winebibbers<s%>, Among gluttonous <S%H2151>eaters<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>:
For the <S%H5433>drunkard<s%> and the <S%H2151>glutton<s%> shall come to <S%H3423>poverty<s%>; And <S%H5124>drowsiness<s%> will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> a man with <S%H7168>rags<s%>.
Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto thy <S%H1>father<s%> that <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H936>thee<s%>, And despise not thy <S%H517>mother<s%> when she is <S%H2204>old<s%>.
Buy <S%H7069><s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%>, and <S%H4376>sell<s%> it <S%H2451>not<s%>; Yea, wisdom, and <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
The <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H1524>greatly<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>; And he that <S%H3205>begetteth<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> child will have joy of <S%H8055>him<s%>.
Let thy <S%H1>father<s%> and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%>, And let her that <S%H3205>bare<s%> thee <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5414>give<s%> me thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>; And let thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7521>delight<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
For a <S%H2181>harlot<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>ditch<s%>; And a foreign <S%H5237>woman<s%> is a <S%H6862>narrow<s%> <S%H875>pit<s%>.
Yea <S%H693><s%>, she lieth in wait as a <S%H2863>robber<s%>, And <S%H3254>increaseth<s%> the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%>.

Who hath <S%H188>woe<s%>? who hath <S%H17>sorrow<s%>? who hath <S%H4079>contentions<s%>? Who hath <S%H7879>complaining<s%>? who hath <S%H6482>wounds<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>? Who hath <S%H2448>redness<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%>?
They that tarry <S%H309>long<s%> at the <S%H3196>wine<s%>; They that <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H2713>seek<s%> out mixed <S%H4469>wine<s%>.

Look <S%H7200><s%> not thou upon the <S%H3196>wine<s%> when it is <S%H119>red<s%>, When <S%H5414>it<s%> <S%H5869>sparkleth<s%> in the <S%H3563>cup<s%>, When it <S%H1980>goeth<s%> down <S%H4339>smoothly<s%>:
At the <S%H319>last<s%> it <S%H5391>biteth<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>, And <S%H6567>stingeth<s%> like an <S%H6848>adder<s%>.
Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> strange <S%H2114>things<s%>, And thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1696>utter<s%> perverse <S%H8419>things<s%>.
Yea <S%H7901><s%>, thou shalt be as he that lieth down in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, Or as he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2260>mast<s%>.

They have <S%H5221>stricken<s%> <S%H2470>me<s%>, shalt thou say, and I was not hurt; They have <S%H1986>beaten<s%> <S%H3045>me<s%>, and I felt it <S%H6974>not<s%>: When shall I awake? I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> it yet <S%H3254>again<s%>.
